game

Class HumanAttackAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.AttackAction
        • game.HumanAttackAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    public class HumanAttackAction
extends AttackAction
    Special class which represents action taken by alive actors (Human/Player) to attack undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie).
    Author:
    Kee Pei Jiin, Tan Wei Li

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class game.AttackAction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void attackSuccess(int damage, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weaponUsed, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Attack is successful, hurt the target (Zombie) and have chance to knock one of its limbs off Update the result string if target's limb is dropped.
      protected void killTarget(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Human successfully kills his target, Zombie/Mambo Marie.
      protected java.lang.Boolean missAttack(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon)
      Return Boolean to indicate if the actor misses the target based on miss chance if it is specified in the attack action, else based on 50% chance.

        target - A Zombie object, target of shooting is Zombie

    • Method Detail

      • missAttack

        protected java.lang.Boolean missAttack(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon)
        Return Boolean to indicate if the actor misses the target based on miss chance if it is specified in the attack action, else based on 50% chance.
        Specified by:
        missAttack in class AttackAction
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon used in the attack
        Returns:
        True if the actor misses the target and false otherwise.

      • killTarget

        protected void killTarget(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Human successfully kills his target, Zombie/Mambo Marie. The Zombie/Mambo Marie becomes a corpse. The method also adds the DEAD capability to the target if target is Priestess (Mambo Marie).
        Specified by:
        killTarget in class AttackAction
        Parameters:
        map - The map the actor is on.

      • attackSuccess

        protected void attackSuccess(int damage,
                             edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                             edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weaponUsed,
                             edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Attack is successful, hurt the target (Zombie) and have chance to knock one of its limbs off Update the result string if target's limb is dropped.
        Specified by:
        attackSuccess in class AttackAction
        Parameters:
        damage - The damage point that the target suffers from.
        actor - The actor performing the attack action.
        weaponUsed - The weapon used in the attack.
        map - The map the actor is on.
